summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3191 for the improvement of Fairview Avenue North, from a connection with the existing trestle at Roanoke Street to the north margin of Shelby Street all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39375, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
